sets.description: When using at least **1** flame weapon, increase flame attack by **12%/14%/16%/18%**, increase flame damage by **7%/8%/9%/10%**. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.

Different effects are obtained according to the number of different elemental weapons equipped: for each flame/ice/physical/lightning weapon equpped, increase flame/ice/physical/lightning damage by **9%/11%/13%/15%**. For each altered weapon equipped, increase final damage by **12%/14%/17%/20%**. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
